verses.verse: הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold יֽוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> yom- Behold the day בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> ba cometh לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְחֻלַּ֥ק <S%H2505><s%> ve-chul-Lak shall be divided שְׁלָלֵ֖ךְ <S%H7998><s%> she-la-Lech and thy spoil בְּקִרְבֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Bech. in the midst

וְאָסַפְתִּ֨י <S%H622><s%> ve-'a-saf-Ti For I will gather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַגּוֹיִ֥ם׀ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim all nations אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against יְרוּשָׁלִַם֮ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim against Jerusalem לַמִּלְחָמָה֒ <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah to battle וְנִלְכְּדָ֣ה <S%H3920><s%> ve-nil-ke-Dah shall be taken הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, and the city וְנָשַׁ֙סּוּ֙ <S%H8155><s%> ve-na-Shas-su rifled הַבָּ֣תִּ֔ים <S%H1004><s%> hab-Bat-Tim, and the houses וְהַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> ve-han-na-Shim and the women; תִּשָּׁגַלְנָה tish-sha-gal-nah כתִּשָּׁכַ֑בְנָה <S%H7693><s%> tish-sha-Chav-nah; lie with קוְיָצָ֞א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza shall go forth חֲצִ֤י <S%H2677><s%> cha-Tzi and half הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of the city בַּגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> bag-go-Lah, into captivity וְיֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> ve-Ye-ter and the residue הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, of the people לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִכָּרֵ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> yik-ka-Ret shall not be cut off מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir. from the city

וְיָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza go forth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God וְנִלְחַ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> ve-nil-Cham and fight בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim against those nations הָהֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> ha-Hem; those כְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> ke-Yom as when הִֽלָּחֲמ֖וֹ <S%H3898><s%> hil-la-cha-Mo he fought בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom in the day קְרָֽב׃ <S%H7128><s%> ke-Rav. of battle

וְעָמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> ve-'a-me-Du shall stand רַגְלָ֣יו <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lav And his feet בַּיּוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> bai-yom- in that day הַ֠הוּא <S%H1931><s%> Ha-hu he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַ֨ר <S%H2022><s%> har upon the mount הַזֵּתִ֜ים <S%H2132><s%> haz-ze-Tim of Olives אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is in פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei which [is] before יְרוּשָׁלִַם֮ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem מִקֶּדֶם֒ <S%H6924><s%> mik-ke-Dem on the east וְנִבְקַע֩ <S%H1234><s%> ve-niv-Ka' shall cleave הַ֨ר <S%H2022><s%> har and the mount הַזֵּיתִ֤ים <S%H2132><s%> haz-zei-Tim of Olives מֵֽחֶצְיוֹ֙ <S%H2677><s%> me-chetz-Yo in the midst מִזְרָ֣חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah thereof toward the east וָיָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> va-Yam-mah, and toward the west גֵּ֖יא <S%H1516><s%> gei valley גְּדוֹלָ֣ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah great מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; [and there shall be] a very וּמָ֨שׁ <S%H4185><s%> u-Mash shall remove חֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> cha-Tzi and half הָהָ֛ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har of the mountain צָפ֖וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah toward the north וְחֶצְיוֹ־ <S%H2677><s%> ve-chetz-yov- and half נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <S%H5045><s%> Neg-bah. of it toward the south

וְנַסְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5127><s%> ve-nas-Tem And ye shall flee גֵּֽיא־ <S%H1516><s%> gei- [to] the valley הָרַ֗י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rai, of the mountains כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יַגִּ֣יעַ <S%H5060><s%> yag-Gi-a' shall reach גֵּי־ <S%H1516><s%> gei- for the valley הָרִים֮ <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim of the mountains אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אָצַל֒ <S%H682><s%> 'a-Tzal unto Azal וְנַסְתֶּ֗ם <S%H5127><s%> ve-nas-Tem, yea ye shall flee כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher you נַסְתֶּם֙ <S%H5127><s%> nas-Tem like as ye fled מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from before הָרַ֔עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> ha-Ra-'ash, the earthquake בִּימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei in the days עֻזִּיָּ֣ה <S%H5818><s%> 'uz-zi-Yah of Uzziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah וּבָא֙ <S%H935><s%> u-Va shall come יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD אֱלֹהַ֔י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai, my God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all קְדֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H6918><s%> ke-do-Shim [and] all the saints עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach. with

וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu; he לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will be no יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become א֔וֹר <S%H216><s%> or, [that] the light יְקָר֖וֹת <S%H3368><s%> ye-ka-Rot shall not be clear; יִקְפְּאוּן yik-pe-'un כוְקִפָּאֹֽון׃ <S%H7087><s%> ve-kip-pa-'on. congeal ק

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will come יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> yom- day אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, But it shall be one ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu which יִוָּדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> yiv-va-Da' which shall be known לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh to the LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- neither י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom not day וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> La-ye-lah; nor night וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will come לְעֵֽת־ <S%H6256><s%> le-'et- time עֶ֖רֶב <S%H6153><s%> 'E-rev but it shall come to pass [that] at evening יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- will come אֽוֹר׃ <S%H216><s%> or. it shall be light

וְהָיָ֣ה׀ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom And it shall be in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he יֵצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> ye-tze-'U shall go out מַֽיִם־ <S%H4325><s%> ma-yim- waters חַיִּים֙ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yim [that] living מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> mi-Ru-sha-Lim, from Jerusalem חֶצְיָ֗ם <S%H2677><s%> chetz-Yam, half אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam sea הַקַּדְמוֹנִ֔י <S%H6931><s%> hak-kad-mo-Ni, of them toward the former וְחֶצְיָ֖ם <S%H2677><s%> ve-chetz-Yam and half אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- toward הַיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam sea הָאַחֲר֑וֹן <S%H314><s%> ha-'a-cha-Ron; of them toward the hinder בַּקַּ֥יִץ <S%H7019><s%> bak-Ka-yitz in summer וּבָחֹ֖רֶף <S%H2779><s%> u-va-Cho-ref and in winter יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> Yih-Yeh. become

וְיָ֣שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> ve-Ya-she-vu And [men] shall dwell בָ֔הּ Vah, וְחֵ֖רֶם <S%H2764><s%> ve-Che-rem in it and there shall be no more utter destruction לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo will no יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od; longer וְיָשְׁבָ֥ה <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-she-Vah inhabited יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim but Jerusalem לָבֶֽטַח׃ <S%H983><s%> la-Ve-tach. shall be safely
